𝗘𝗫𝗢𝗗𝗨𝗦 | Relocating Linux binaries and their dependencies to systems where they are not natively available or easily installed.  🔥 Super Hot!

❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🐍 Python 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Relocating Linux binaries and their dependencies to systems where they are not natively available or easily installed.
📅 Created: Jan 2018 • Updated: Jul 2025

❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Relocates Linux ELF binaries
✅ Bundles all binary dependencies
✅ Compiles a statically linked wrapper
✅ Installs the bundle in ~/.exodus/


❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐⭐ 3K 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 72 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 18 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Exodus is a tool for painless relocation of Linux ELF binaries. It bundles all dependencies, creates a statically linked wrapper, and installs the package on the target machine, enabling software to run on systems where it might otherwise be unavailable due to missing packages or outdated distributions.

❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

🔗 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/intoli/exodus

The network-debug repository provides a CLI tool for diagnosing, benchmarking, and optimizing Linux networking. It offers features such as comprehensive network diagnosis, safety-first design with dry-run and rollback capabilities, and cross-distribution support. The tool is designed for developers, system administrators, and power users to optimize network performance with safety and flexibility.

The Fluent UI System Icons repository offers a wide range of meticulously designed icons for diverse platforms. It provides installation guides and tools for seamless integration into Android, iOS, macOS, Flutter, and web projects. The repository also includes features like RTL/LTR support and a build pipeline for automated library creation.

DocsGPT is an open-source genAI tool designed to provide reliable answers from various knowledge sources, mitigating hallucinations. It supports a wide range of document formats and web integrations, offering features like streamlined API keys, actionable tooling, and pre-built integrations. DocsGPT is designed for secure and scalable deployment, compatible with major LLMs and local models, making it suitable for enterprise-grade applications.

Sparrow is a tool for structured data extraction and instruction calling, leveraging ML, LLMs, and Vision LLMs. It supports various document formats and backends, offering a pluggable architecture and schema validation. The system provides RESTful APIs, visual monitoring, and is designed for universal document processing and enterprise readiness.

MaxKB is an open-source platform designed for building enterprise-grade agents. It integrates a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipeline, supports agentic workflows, and offers MCP tool-use capabilities. MaxKB is suitable for applications like intelligent customer service, internal knowledge bases, and research, providing a comprehensive solution for creating intelligent agents.
